duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide patient care in the medical-surgical setting, including assessment, planning, and implementation of patient treatment plans.
Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to coordinate patient care and ensure positive outcomes.
Document patient medical information, treatment plans, and progress in accordance with healthcare standards and regulations.
Use critical thinking skills to assess patient conditions, prioritize care, and respond to emergencies.
Work collaboratively with colleagues to provide emotional support and empathy to patients and their families.
Demonstrate empathy and understanding in patient interactions, promoting a compassionate and caring environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Nursing (RN) or equivalent certification
